Uses of Interface
com.github.javactic.Validation

    • Uses of Validation in com.github.javactic

      Classes in com.github.javactic that implement Validation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Fail<T>
      Indicates a validation failed, describing the failure with a contained error value.
      class  Pass<T>
      Indicates a validation succeeded.
      Methods in com.github.javactic that return Validation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Validation<E> Validation.and(Validation<E> other)
      Ands this Validation with another, passed, Validation.
      Validation<T> Pass.and(Validation<T> other) 
      Validation<T> Fail.and(Validation<T> other) 
      Methods in com.github.javactic with parameters of type Validation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Validation<E> Validation.and(Validation<E> other)
      Ands this Validation with another, passed, Validation.
      Validation<T> Pass.and(Validation<T> other) 
      Validation<T> Fail.and(Validation<T> other) 
      Method parameters in com.github.javactic with type arguments of type Validation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Or<G,B> Bad.filter(Function<? super G,Validation<B>> validator) 
      Or<G,B> Or.filter(Function<? super G,Validation<B>> validator)
      Returns this Or if either 1) it is a Bad or 2) it is a Good and applying the validation function validation to this Good's value returns Pass; otherwise, returns a new Bad containing the error value contained in the Fail resulting from applying the validation function validation to this Good's value.
      Or<G,B> Good.filter(Function<? super G,Validation<B>> validator)
